name: min-max-tic-tac-toe
description: A javascript, min/max AI for playing tic tac toe

scripts.layer:build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.layer:package: npm run layer:build && mkdir -p dist/layer/nodejs/node_modules/min-max-tic-tac-toe && cp -r dist/src/** dist/layer/nodejs/node_modules/min-max-tic-tac-toe
scripts.layer:zip: npm run layer:package && cd dist/layer && zip -r ../../archive.zip *
scripts.layer:publish: npm run layer:zip && aws lambda publish-layer-version --layer-name min-max-tic-tac-toe-layer --zip-file fileb://archive.zip --compatible-architectures x86_64 --compatible-runtimes nodejs16.x
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Amir Kouretchian
